100.title: Axe lessons
100.description:
You asked Jack for some advice with your axe handling.
He simply told you to not use the blund side, but the sharp one. You dummy...

This doubles your wood production!

200.title: Jack the Lumberjack
200.description:
A big, bearded man walks out of the forest. He introcues himself as Jack and offers to help you with your wood production
"For a moment I was really scared"
- You

201.title: Actual axe
201.description:
Now your Lumber doesn't need to cut down trees with his hands anymore...
"Finally... thanks man"
- Jack the Lumber Jack

300.title: Get better at stone cutting...
300.description:
A big, bearded man walks out of the forest. He introcues himself as Jack and offers to help you with your wood production
"For a moment I was really scared"
- You

400.title: Fred the stonecutter
400.description: One of Jack's helpers, Fred, seems to be more into rocks than trees. After Jack caught him hugging a large stone, he got fired... Couldn't you use a stonecutter?
